name: icon-gallery
title: IconGallery
description: Documentation utility for browsing all available Lucide icons with search, category filtering, and click-to-copy import statements. Not intended for use in production applications. Displays icons in a responsive grid with real-time search.

files.content:
/**
 * IconGallery Component - Browsable icon reference display.
 *
 * Used for documentation and development. Shows all available Lucide icons.
 *
 * @example
 * ```tsx
 * import { IconGallery } from '@orion-ds/react';
 *
 * // Shows searchable gallery of all Lucide icons
 * <IconGallery />
 *
 * // With custom categories
 * <IconGallery categories={['navigation', 'actions', 'media']} />
 * ```
 */
export { IconGallery } from "./IconGallery";
export type { IconGalleryProps } from "./IconGallery.types";

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS class name for the gallery container.

examples.title: Full icon gallery page

notes: Each icon item is a button with a title attribute for the icon name
Click-to-copy provides visual feedback via a 'Copied!' badge
Search input for filtering icons in real-time
Category buttons for filtering by icon group
